Welcome to

where the art of craftsmanship meets the elegance of sustainable fashion. At Woven, we specialize in creating exquisite straw bags for women, crafted primarily from abaca, a natural fiber sourced from the Philippines known for its strength and durability. Our collections are inspired by the timeless allure of abaca, meticulously designed to complement any wardrobe with a touch of natural beauty. Each Woven bag reflects our commitment to environmental responsibility, combining eco-friendly practices with stylish innovation. By choosing abaca, we ensure that our bags are not only chic but also sustainable, supporting a greener future. Discover the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern sophistication with Woven, and elevate your style with nature's finest fibers from the Philippines.

PREMIUM QUALITY

Crafted for enduring elegance, yet versatile enough to keep up with the latest fashion trends.

FREE SHIPPING

Enjoy daily free shipping on all orders with a minimum purchase.

OFFICIAL STORE

The official online store for genuine Secosana bags.

SECURE CHECKOUT

We ensure a completely safe and secure checkout process.
